name: Soul Land II

content: A young boy ridiculed as a useless child makes pledge to himself to become a spirit master after his mother dies. what will happen to him on his adventuresâ€¦ You also may like: Douluo Dalu 3: The Legend of the Dragon King Wu Dong Qian Kun Douluo Dalu
